instructions: On your iPhone or iPad, open the Gboard app . Tap Languages and then Add Language . Scroll down and tap Morse Code (US) .

On your iPhone or iPad, open any app that you can type with, like Gmail or Keep. Tap where you can enter text. Touch and hold the Globe . Tap Morse code (US) . Enter text using the dot (.) and dash (-).
On your iPhone or iPad, open the Gboard app . Tap Languages . Scroll down and tap Morse Code (US) . From here, you can turn on settings, like Sound on keypress , Character timeout , and Key repeat .
